divs: sighting detailsi was coming home from scouts in my dads car, just between orem and springville on the interstate, i was looking up at the moon, i think it was full that night. next to the moon was a small little star, which i thought was odd, because i'd never seen a star that close to the moon before, so i watched it. after about 5 minutes of watching it, it suddenly took off, it was out of site in about 1\2 a second. i was surprised at first, then, remembering a book about ufos i had read, took note of the date and time, and wrote it down, the paper, i have since lost, so the time is fuzzy. i know it wasn't a shooting star due to the fact, that it was just sitting there for quite a while.
Summary: small dot, it was far away, so like a star
trends: There have been no other sightings in Springville
This sighting has never been favorited.
